name: What Am I Gonna Do With A Gun Rack? (Tee)
description: TITLE: What Am I Gonna Do With A Gun Rack? INSPIRATION: As quoted by Mike Myers in Wayne's World, this shirt asks a simple question: What am I gonna do with a gun rack? MEDIUM: This shirt is printed on a 5.5 oz 100% Deluxe combed ring-spun cotton blank. Featuring a ¾” Set-in collar, double-needle bottom hem and sleeves with shoulder-to-shoulder tape. Pre-shrunk to minimize shrinkage. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: The Misfit
description: TITLE: The Misfit INSPIRATION: Since the Misfits based their famous logo on the Crimson Ghost, Zorse figured it should continue the trend by adapting the image with its own variation. MEDIUM: This shirt is printed on a 6.0 oz 100% cotton tubular jersey. Classic Tank Top fit, double-needle bottom hem and sleeves, with bound collar and armholes. Pre-shrunk to minimize shrinkage. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: The Bluth
description: TITLE:The Bluth THIS SHIRT:The Bluth is the first shirt released for the New Year. New Gear. 2013 line. Featuring a 14” Banana print, this eye-catching banana colorway is limited to 20 hand-numbered pieces. INSPIRATION: This design takes its name from Arrested Development’s famous family and the banana stand that refused to die. MEDIUM: This premium shirt features the highest quality garment and printing that Zorse Clothing MFG. offers. These shirts are 100% ringspun cotton, providing the softest feel. They are also more of a streetwear cut, offering a relatively long and straight torso as well as tapered sleeves that still have extra room for comfort. The premium shirts also feature hand-printed, extra-large hem tags that are hand numbered to signify the limited edition. All tees are printed by hand at Zorse HQ in NH. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: The Weekend Editor
description: TITLE:The Weekend Editor THIS SHIRT:The Weekend Editor shirt features a front print of a Hi-Def VHS tape on an athletic heather shirt. The handwritten appearance of the title is a throwback to a time before DVRs and Netflix. INSPIRATION: This shirt is for any of the Other Guys that have ever cut three minutes out of GoodFellas. MEDIUM: This premium shirt features the highest quality garment and printing that Zorse Clothing MFG. offers. These shirts are 100% ringspun cotton, providing the softest feel. They are also more of a streetwear cut, offering a relatively long and straight torso as well as tapered sleeves that still have extra room for comfort. The premium shirts also feature hand-printed, extra-large hem tags that are hand numbered to signify the limited edition. All tees are printed by hand at Zorse HQ in NH. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: The Rock Show (Blue)
description: TITLE: The Rock Show INSPIRATION: Named after arguably the best song on “Take Off Your Pants and Jacket” this tank top will make you king of the mosh pit. MEDIUM: This shirt is printed on a 6.0 oz 100% cotton tubular jersey. Classic Tank Top fit, double-needle bottom hem and sleeves, with bound collar and armholes. Pre-shrunk to minimize shrinkage. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: The Rock Show
description: TITLE: The Rock Show INSPIRATION: Named after arguably the best song on “Take Off Your Pants and Jacket” this tank top will make you king of the mosh pit. MEDIUM: This shirt is printed on a 6.0 oz 100% cotton tubular jersey. Classic Tank Top fit, double-needle bottom hem and sleeves, with bound collar and armholes. Pre-shrunk to minimize shrinkage. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: Big Ol' Hat
description: TITLE: Big Ol’ Hat THIS HAT:This hat features a double-sided XL hemtag that was printed and applied by hand to keep you looking cool and feeling warm. Available now in silver and purple. INSPIRATION: This hat was inspired by Jack Black’s burning ideas that he presents in Orange County while speeding down the freeway in a rusted Bronco. MEDIUM: These hats are made of 100% super-soft acrylic with a cotton hem tag. While lightweight in feel, they provide an excellent amount of warmth and fit skulls of most sizes. SIZING: One size fits most adults.

name: Huge 2.0
description: TITLE: The Huge 2.0 Tee THIS SHIRT:The Huge 2.0 Tee is part of the Summer 2012 Line and sets a new standard for Zorse Clothing. The new tees are limited edition with only 20 shirts printed in each colorway. This shirt features the new company logo in a 15” print on the front, as well as bold prints on both sleeves. INSPIRATION: The Huge 2.0 Tee serves to debut the new Zorse logo and sets a new standard for Zorse Clothing. The company is evolving, becoming more grown-up and professional as the quality and delivery of products improves even further. MEDIUM: This new line of premium shirts features the highest quality garment and printing that Zorse Clothing offers. These shirts are 100% ringspun cotton, providing the softest feel. They are also more of a streetwear cut, offering a relatively long and straight torso as well as tapered sleeves that still have extra room for comfort. The premium shirts also feature hand-printed, extra-large hem tags that are hand numbered to signify the limited edition. All tees are printed by hand at Zorse HQ in NH. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: The Bank
description: TITLE: The Bank Tee THIS SHIRT:The Bank Tee is part of the Summer 2012 Line and sets a new standard for Zorse Clothing. The new tees are limited edition with only 20 shirts printed in each colorway. The bold pink piggy bank and the Zorse logo coin make this shirt practically priceless. INSPIRATION: The Bank Tee was inspired by an actual piggy bank that has been sitting in my room my entire memorable life. The design was first used for stickers and promos but the design was too good to not use in the Summer 2012 Line. MEDIUM: This new line of premium shirts features the highest quality garment and printing that Zorse Clothing offers. These shirts are 100% ringspun cotton, providing the softest feel. They are also more of a streetwear cut, offering a relatively long and straight torso as well as tapered sleeves that still have extra room for comfort. The premium shirts also feature hand-printed, extra-large hem tags that are hand numbered to signify the limited edition. All tees are printed by hand at Zorse HQ in NH. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: Nelly's Shoes
description:
Final Payment for Shoes

Price Includes Shipping

Light Blue Vans Authentic Base

Custom Beetle Pattern

Small Bear on Left Inside Heel

name: Baseball Tee
description: TITLE: Baseball: A Shirt by Zorse Clothing THIS SHIRT:The Baseball Tee is part of the Summer 2012 Line and sets a new standard for Zorse Clothing. The new tees are limited edition with only 20 shirts printed in each colorway. This shirt features a new variation on the Zorse logo on the front and a 2009 logo on the back. INSPIRATION: The tee is called Baseball: A Shirt by Zorse Clothing. It serves as an homage to summer, as this tee is part of the Summer 2012 line. It also pays tribute to the band Say Anything and their debut titled Baseball: An Album by Sayanything. MEDIUM: This new line of premium shirts features the highest quality garment and printing that Zorse Clothing offers. These shirts are 100% ringspun cotton, providing the softest feel. They are also more of a streetwear cut, offering a relatively long and straight torso as well as tapered sleeves that still have extra room for comfort. The premium shirts also feature hand-printed, extra-large hem tags that are hand numbered to signify the limited edition. All tees are printed by hand at Zorse HQ in NH. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: Bones
description: TITLE: Bones INSPIRATION: Named after the song “Bones” by Saves the Day, this shirt was released for Halloween 2011. It remained as a tour-only item until just recently. This shirt is very rare and is now finally available online. MEDIUM: This shirt is printed on a 100% preshrunk combed ringspun cotton shirt with taped shoulder-to-shoulder hemmed sleeves and bottom ribbed collar. The blank has a trim, modern fit. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: Original Granite State Tee
description: TITLE: The Original Granite State Tee THIS SHIRT: The Original Granite State Tee is part of the original lineup of designs released by Zorse Clothing. This design was made long before Zorse Clothing actually existed, and has proven to be the most popular design to date. Less than 50 of The Original Granite State tees have been printed and this will likely be the last pressing of this design. INSPIRATION: This is actually the first item that was ever released by the company; this is where it all started. This is the first shirt design that was sold out of a cardboard box in the back of a Scion xB. It features the original Zorse Head logo centered below a striped outline of the company’s home state. MEDIUM: The original lineup of designs released by Zorse Clothing was printed on 4.5 oz ringspung cotton shirts. These are some of the softest shirts available, and have a more fashionable slim-fitting profile. Each shirt is printed by hand at the Zorse HQ in New Hampshire. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: 'UGE Tee
description: TITLE: The Original ‘Uge Tee THIS SHIRT: The Original ‘Uge Tee is part of the original lineup of designs released by Zorse Clothing. There were less than 25 of these shirts ever made with the Original ‘Uge design and this will likely be the last pressing of this shirt. INSPIRATION: The Original ‘Uge design was inspired by Larry David’s work on the show Curb Your Enthusiasm in the episode “The Ski Lift”. His bold sense of humor and his willingness to cross lines and stand out merges so well with Zorse Clothing that this shirt had no choice but to come to life. MEDIUM: The original lineup of designs released by Zorse Clothing was printed on 4.5 oz ringspung cotton shirts. These are some of the softest shirts available, and have a more fashionable slim-fitting profile. Each shirt is printed by hand at the Zorse HQ in New Hampshire. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: Purple Cobra Tee
description: Purple Cobra Tee TITLE: The Purple Cobra Tee THIS SHIRT: The Purple Cobra Tee is part of the original lineup of designs released by Zorse Clothing. There were less than 25 of these shirts ever made with the Cobra design and this will likely be the last pressing of this shirt. INSPIRATION: Based loosely on a fictional dodge ball team led by White Goodman, the Purple Cobra Tee is guaranteed to make you play like a champion. You certainly wouldn't look like any of the other Average Joes when you put on this piece of Zorse Clothing. MEDIUM: The original lineup of designs released by Zorse Clothing was printed on 4.5 oz ringspung cotton shirts. These are some of the softest shirts available, and have a more fashionable slim-fitting profile. Each shirt is printed by hand at the Zorse HQ in New Hampshire. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: When Life Gives You Lemons...
description: TITLE: When Life Gives You Lemons… THIS SHIRT: The When Life Gives You Lemons… Tee is part of the original lineup of designs released by Zorse Clothing. There were less than 25 of these shirts ever made with the Lemon design and this will likely be the last pressing of this shirt. INSPIRATION: Paul Rudd offers us one of the best life lessons ever when he says, “When life gives you lemons, just say f**k lemons and bail,” in the classic Forgetting Sarah Marshall . This shirt pays homage to both the humor and outlook on life that only Paul Rudd could deliver in the form of a middle-aged surfing instructor. MEDIUM: The original lineup of designs released by Zorse Clothing was printed on 4.5 oz ringspung cotton shirts. These are some of the softest shirts available, and have a more fashionable slim-fitting profile. Each shirt is printed by hand at the Zorse HQ in New Hampshire. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: Granite State Shoe
description: TITLE: The Granite State Shoe THIS SHOE: The Granite State Shoe serves as the ultimate homage to Zorse Clothing’s home state. Every shoe is also adorned with a hand-printed and numbered tongue tag that certifies its authenticity. This was the first piece of footwear put out by Zorse Clothing and only ten pairs of this shoe will ever be made. INSPIRATION: Zorse clothing was born and thrives in New Hampshire. The body of the shoe is a dark evergreen color. The granite-style side panels are a mixture of black and gold that shine each time these shoes hit the sun. The famed Old Man of the Mountain lives on the side panels in a block-print styling that lays over the outside swoosh. MEDIUM: Granite State shoes are made from authentic Nike Air Force 1 ’07 Lows that have been customized and refinished. This shoe is guaranteed by Zorse Clothing to be at least 93% as durable as the stock factory shoe. The custom-painted surface is water resistant and will not run, though it is recommended that the user avoids activities like soccer or skateboarding for longer-lasting shoes. *Only 5 pairs of this shoe have been made to date. The second wave of the project will be announced at some unknown time in the future.* SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: Tiger Shark Tee-SOLD OUT
description: TITLE: The Tiger Shark Tee THIS SHIRT: The Tiger Shark Tee is part of the original lineup of designs released by Zorse Clothing. There were less than 25 of these shirts ever made with the Original ‘Uge design and this will likely be the last pressing of this shirt. INSPIRATION: Tiger sharks: stealthy, silent, and lethal. Each one of these aquatic demons is crafted by hand and printed on tees that were dyed in house. These sea monsters made their way into the Zorse collection after their legend was told by Quint in the 1975 classic thriller Jaws. MEDIUM: The original lineup of designs released by Zorse Clothing was printed on 4.5 oz ringspung cotton shirts. These are some of the softest shirts available, and have a more fashionable slim-fitting profile. Each shirt is printed by hand at the Zorse HQ in New Hampshire. Each Tiger Shark Tee is printed on a water blue shirt that was dyed in house, and features subtle tints and hues as a result of the coloring process. This ensures that each Tiger Shark will feel at home on your shirt, and that no one else will have a tee that is exactly like yours. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: Granite State Tee (Murdered-Out)
description: TITLE: The Granite State Tee (Murdered Out) THIS SHIRT: The Murdered-Out Edition of the Granite State tee is part of the original lineup of designs released by Zorse Clothing. This version was created due to popular demand from the Zorse fan base and was put out for those who like the darker side of the Granite State. Less than 25 of these shirts were ever produced, and this will likely be the last pressing of this design. INSPIRATION: This shirt features the same design printed on the Original Granite State Tee. This is the first shirt design that was sold out of a cardboard box in the back of a Scion xB. It features the original Zorse Head logo centered below a striped outline of the company’s home state. MEDIUM: The original lineup of designs released by Zorse Clothing was printed on 4.5 oz ringspung cotton shirts. These are some of the softest shirts available, and have a more fashionable slim-fitting profile. Each shirt is printed by hand at the Zorse HQ in New Hampshire. This was the last shirt that was dyed in-house, and features a signature gray color that is unlike any other shirt available. SIZING: See FAQ Page

name: Granite State Bandana
description: TITLE: The Granite State Bandana THIS SHIRT: The Granite State Bandana was released shortly after the Original Granite State Tee was put out. This design was made long before Zorse Clothing actually existed, and has proven to be the most popular design to date. Less than 10 of these bandanas were printed and this will likely be the last pressing of this design. INSPIRATION: This bandana features the same design printed on the Original Granite State Tee. This is the first design that was sold out of a cardboard box in the back of a Scion xB. It features the original Zorse Head logo centered below a striped outline of the company’s home state. MEDIUM: These bandanas are 100% cotton and are 15” square. Each is printed by hand at Zorse HQ in New Hampshire.
